resources.string: To get the full benefit out of this app you need to agree to our <font color="#FF3F00">privacy policy</font>. This states that you are ok with us accessing your device id to track your votes and to store your favorites. Nothing more though.
Go to <font color="#FF3F00">our site</font> for more videos and photos.
Get reminders about the talks that you donâ€™t want to miss. You will get a reminder before it takes place so you have plenty of time to get there.
You can already check out the schedule and mark your favorite talks.
